title: Selectric font?
content:
I wonder if anyone knows this font – I suspect it might be an old IBM Selectric typewriter font  
but maybe there is a digital version or close match available? Any suggestions appreciated!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130321163039im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typeface_crop_3548.jpg)
author: W1
